text: Henri Leonetti (6 January 1937 – 27 February 2018) was a French footballer who played as a defender. ==Career== Born in Marseille, he played for Marseille and La Ciotat. ==Personal life== He died on 27 February 2018, aged 81. His brother Jean-Louis was also a footballer. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:French footballers Category:Olympique de Marseille players Category:ES La Ciotat players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Association football defenders
title: Henri Leonetti
